dolfin Package¶

dolfin Package¶

This module contains all binding to c++ classes and bindings connected to dolfin

class magnumfe.dolfin.Mesher¶

Bases: magnumfe.cpp.Mesher

This class uses the GMSH library to generate dolfin meshes. Especially it offers methods to surround arbitrary meshes with a cuboid shell that is required for the demagnetization-field transformation method.

Creating a cuboid shell assumes that the coordinate origin is in the center of the sample mesh (The resulting mesh will be symmetric around the coordinate origin).

Example

mesher = Mesher()
mesher.read_file("sample.msh")
mesher.create_shell(2, 0.1, (10, 10, 10));
mesh = mesher.mesh()
create_cuboid(size, n)¶

Creates a cuboid of given dimension around the coordinate origin.

Arguments
size
Size of the cuboid.
n
Number of mesh points.
create_shell(d, margin=0.0, n=(0, 0, 0), progression=1.0)¶

Creates a cuboid shell around the current sample.

Arguments
d
Number of layers of the shell mesh.
margin
Margin between sample and shell (useful for meshes read from file).
n
Number of mesh points of shell. (only needed if mesh was read from file)
progression
Defines coarsening of the shell layers. 1.0 means no coarsening.
get_sample_size(i=-1, scale=1.0)¶

Returns the sample size (inner-shell size) in a given dimension. Scaling used for mesh generation is not considered. If no direction is specified a list of sizes is returned.

Arguments
i
The dimension (direction).
scale
Scaling of the mesh.
mesh(scale=1.0)¶

Mesh the geometry and return dolfin mesh.

Arguments
scale
Scaling of the mesh. Useful for very small meshes.
class magnumfe.dolfin.MetricMatrix¶

Bases: object

This class defines a static method for the creation of expressions of the metric matrix used for the stray-field transformation method.

static create_for_cube(size, coord, order=1)¶

Creates an expression for the metric matrix used for the cuboid transformation method for the stray-field calculation.

Arguments
size
The size of the inner cuboid. This is used for the correct scaling of the tensor.
coord
The principal direction of transformation. For each shell patch this has to be chosen accordingly.
order
Order of transformation. Use 1 for P1 finite elements and 2 for P>1 elements.
class magnumfe.dolfin.DofAssembler¶

Bases: magnumfe.cpp.DofAssembler

This class defines static methods for the assembly of _DofForm_ instances.

static assemble(a)¶

Assemles a _DofForm_.

Arguments
a
_DofForm_ to assemble.
class magnumfe.dolfin.ScalarProductMatrix(*args)¶

Bases: magnumfe.cpp.ScalarProductMatrix

The class represents a matrix that is used to compute the nodewise scalar product with a given vector.

class magnumfe.dolfin.ScalarProductMatrix2(*args)¶

Bases: magnumfe.cpp.ScalarProductMatrix2

The class represents a matrix that is used to compute the nodewise scalar product with a given vector.

class magnumfe.dolfin.TransScalarProductMatrix(*args)¶

Bases: magnumfe.cpp.TransScalarProductMatrix

The class represents a transposed matrix that is used to compute the nodewise scalar product with a given vector.

class magnumfe.dolfin.NormalizedVector(*args)¶

Bases: magnumfe.cpp.NormalizedVector

The class defines a _DofForm_ that represents a nodewise normalized vector field.

dofassembler Module¶

This module defines wrapper classes associated with the DofForm class and the DofAssembler.

mesher Module¶

This module defines a wrapper for the Mesher class
